name: RedHoodz
description:
Put your red hoodie on and jump and run in this super casual adventure. Hit and burn blocking skeletons, ghosts and bats with your torch, or try to jump over your enemies. All while you collect as many coins as you can. Use items as a fast run sneaker or a coin magnet to gain a benefit. There is also the chance to collect a spare dime while watching a video-ad. So you should never run out of fun.
Try it and challenge your friends in the gamecenter. Have fun and run!
